Sinopse: A serious accident occurred on an offshore drilling platform, which may sink at any time. All members of the Transportation Emergency Response Team heads to location the moment they hear the alarm. With the time counting down, captain Gao Qian leads the helicopters fly into the explosion and fiercely burning fire, targeting at the platform. Together with his team member Zhao Cheng, Gao Qian gets into the platform in the most dangerous way with only one goal - to save the survivors.—Canon y mus
